list.name: Working Memory: n-back
list.description: Sharpen your working memory and short-term retention by constantly challenging your memory limits, making your mind more agile.

list.name: Gaze Training
list.description: Improve your focus and resistance to distraction by continuously gazing at the central black dot, reducing mind-wandering and enhancing sustained attention!

list.name: Schulte Grid
list.description: Find target numbers in a shuffled grid to boost your visual search, sequential processing, and attention distribution skills.

list.name: Eliminate Subvocalization
list.description: Break the habit of reading word by word and improve your reading speed and comprehension.

list.name: Speed Practice
list.description: Train your reading speed in real-world scenarios and push your limits for faster, more efficient reading.
